repairedDockerfile:
#FROM balenalib/raspberrypi3-debian-node:12
FROM balenalib/%%BALENA_MACHINE_NAME%%-debian-node:12
# Install dependencies
RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install --no-install-recommends -yq \
    gcc g++ make build-essential \
    wget \
    git \
    python3 \
    python3-dev \
    python3-pip \
    python3-setuptools \
    libatlas-base-dev libportaudio2 libportaudiocpp0 portaudio19-dev \
    gstreamer-1.0 \
    pkg-config glib2.0-dev libexpat1-dev v4l-utils libjpeg62-turbo-dev \
    sox gstreamer1.0-tools gstreamer1.0-plugins-good gstreamer1.0-plugins-base gstreamer1.0-plugins-base-apps \
    libopencv-dev \
    libavdevice-dev \
    libavfilter-dev \
    libavcodec-dev \
    libopus-dev \
    libvpx-dev \
    libsrtp2-dev \
    libatlas3-base \
    libatlas-base-dev \
    libavformat-dev \
    libswscale-dev \
    #libqtgui4 \
    #libqt4-test \
    libavdevice-dev \
    libavfilter-dev \
    libavcodec-dev \
    python3-six \
  && apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*


# Compile libvips
RUN cd /tmp && \
    wget https://github.com/libvips/libvips/releases/download/v8.10.5/vips-8.10.5.tar.gz && \
    tar xf vips-8.10.5.tar.gz && \
    cd vips-8.10.5 && \
    ./configure --build="$(dpkg-architecture --query DEB_BUILD_GNU_TYPE)" && \
    make -j && \
    sudo make install && \
    sudo ldconfig && rm vips-8.10.5.tar.gz

RUN npm config set user root && sudo npm install edge-impulse-linux -g && npm cache clean --force;

RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir --upgrade pip
RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir numpy opencv-python requests imutils
RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir edge_impulse_linux -i https://pypi.python.org/simple
RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir Flask flask-socketio==4.3.2 flask_cors flask_basicauth Werkzeug==2.0.1
#RUN pip3 install RPi.Gpio adafruit-blinka

WORKDIR /usr/src/app

EXPOSE 8080

COPY ./app/ /usr/src/app/


CMD ["/usr/src/app/ei_run.sh"]
